website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive lightweight booster with a lot of padding that can serve as a good transition from a five-point harness.
pros: Leaves room for other boosters or car seats in the same row
cons: The assembly on this model can be a little complicated

customer_reviews.title: Not a good seat and I'm a Graco loving mom.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I own by Graco and I have owned multiple strollers, pack and play, swing, carseats galore: snug ride, safe seat 1, safe seat 2, smart seat, nautilus and backless booster. This seat feels like lightweight junk and the quality of a doll seat. Mind you the highback falls, the kids have trouble raising it back up and more. I will not buy this seat again and am replacing its use but originally sought it based on size and wanting to fit a third car seat on the same row.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfy seat, Two cup holders, nice fabric, super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old Grandson, who I watch on occasion. He had outgrown his safety seat and was ready for a booster and this one is comfy for him. He loves it and it's nice to be able to buckle him with the regular seat belt. It's also nice that I can easily remove the seat when I'm not watching my Grandson and the seat is needed for another adult. His old safety seat was MUCH more difficult to take in and out. This one comes right out.
customer_reviews.author: Dani G

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price, the shipping was very fast
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the very few seats with a minimum weight requirement of 30bs instead of 40. My daughter is very tiny and was really getting sick of the 5 point harness and I think wont reach 40lbs for another year or two at least. This is a great price, the shipping was very fast, it seems comfortable, well padded, she seems happy. I'm buying another for the second car.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for the money
customer_reviews.text: So many reviewers complained about this seat. It was said to not fit on seats with a headrest, no problem here. Also, when child not in the seat it is suggested that it will not stay put, again no problem here. The kid is comfortable and I have no complaints about this seat. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: H. CrockerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... ago and can say w/o reservation that I'm very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these about a month ago and can say w/o reservation that I'm very pleased with the product. My four year old thinks its very comfortable, loves the dual cup holders and arm rests. The head rest supports him nicely when he dozes off. The cost vs. value cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Too wide and a poor design
customer_reviews.text: This seat is lousy. 1. It's too wide for my midsized car's bucket seats and so it has to be pushed off center every time to get the seatbelt buckled. This means that even when the kid is big enough to buckle themselves, they still can't buckle themselves. 2. The back falls off if you pick it up. Super annoying if you ever move it. 3. It rattles when empty.
customer_reviews.author: BJW

customer_reviews.title: Great carseats
customer_reviews.text: I got the first carseat for my son and its perfect. Easy to put together and easily transferable to other vehicles. I feel like they're very safe in them. I bought one for my daughter yesterday and received it today so super fast shipping. They both fit great in my mustang too.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Lasted us about 2 years before the back support broke. With some pressure my son can accidentally lower the back without touching the lever. Also, the part that is supposed to hold the seat belt in place gets loose all the time. The entire seat has to be readjusted before every use. How would it hold up in a roll over? God forbid that ever happen... I have contacted Graco in hopes of getting a replacement of a different style at a discounted price and they have not emailed me back in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: J.Hdez90

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before making this purchase and although my 4 year old grandson met the weight restrictions, it is not designed for a busy 4 year old. It uses the regular seat belt which can be easily unlocked by the child leaving them unrestrained while driving. Another complaint is that it sits straight upright so when a child falls asleep, their heads have nothing to support them and they fall forward. The 5 point harness car seats were designed for SAFETY and I am returning this one to opt for a safer one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 and has been begging to the out of her 5 point car seat. I have been putting this off because I was concerned that a regular booster didn't provide enough protection. I did some research on this booster and was impressed with the high safety ratings so I decided to give it a shot. We have been very pleased with it. It provides a lot more protection than your standard booster and my daughter still feels like a big girl :) Now my 3 year old wants one!
customer_reviews.author: MHale

customer_reviews.title: My little guy is soooo happy with his big boy chair!
customer_reviews.text: We were so happy with our previous Graco car seat that we stuck with the brand when my son outgrew it. He says it’s super comfy and loves the color and cup holders. I’m grateful, knowing it will keep him safe. UPDATE: we like this one so much, we ordered a second one to send to Grandma's house, so it will be waiting for us when we get there for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Megan the Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect width, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Graco car seat, for this age. We needed it for my mom's van. It's great because the cup holders pop out instead of sticking out permanently. It snaps together quite firmly when you're assembling it, but it is much easier to install since it is seatbelt based rather than 'latch' system. It still provides the side impact of the regular car seats for kids as it has the upper 'wings' but is much more lightweight and great for a spare. It's still really big for traveling though, so you would have to either send it on its own in oversized luggage or you could remove the upper back and just travel with the seat booster.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: and our girls are comfortable in them
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are high-quality, light weight booster seats (we have twins, so we bought 2). Still using the back support piece on both seats, and our girls are comfortable in them. Our girls can sleep anywhere, in any position. Both have found the best sleeping position for themselves while remaining upright and secure. Head/neck support area could stand to be modified to facilitate better sleeping positions (at least from a parent's perspective); children have no complaints about the cervical/neck component/area, and they have never expressed development of a sore neck from the way they have to sleep. The other (minor) complaint is the low height of the outermost cup holder
customer_reviews.author: Youngmom

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I have this same booster seat (in a different color/pattern) for my 7 year old. She uses it without the back now but isn't quite tall enough to not need it at all. My almost 3 year old is very tall just like his sister so we needed an easier booster seat for him to use and he definitely still needs the back. This booster seat is great. You can move it easily between vehicles, there are 2 cup holders that can be hidden away, and the back height is also adjustable for a very tall child which I appreciate having birthed two very tall children. I highly recommend this booster.
customer_reviews.author: Laura32412

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 4 year old who was getting a bit too tall for the bulky infant/toddler seat and we also wanted something that took up less space in the car. The seat is very comfortable and easy to install. The cup holders are flexible so it fits most kid cups. The back of the seat is movable so if your kiddo wants to recline their seat the car seat will recline too. Also, the headrest area is padded and positioned just right so when they fall asleep it holds their head up instead of letting it fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Spinella

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for use when grandchildren visit so that parents don't have to carry car seats on plane. The only difficulty with assembling was that, once assembled, we seemed to have a strap left over. We tried to put it where it showed it should go but then we couldn't get the back on the seat. After much consultation between my son and myself, we realized that the "extra" strap is to be used when the unit is used as a booster seat - WITHOUT THE BACK on it. My 40-pound grandson used the seat for the entire visit and loved it. Loved the cup holder! It worked very well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Salzmann Slaght

customer_reviews.title: **** W A R N I N G!!  EVERYONE NEEDS TO STOP USING and check their seat!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to give the dangerous seat one star to be able to post this warning to parents! Open the box to discover what appears to be a gray/white powdery substance (mildew) covering the entire underside of every piece of the seat. The one time I purchased based off stars and didn't read the reviews.. Shame on you Graco and Amazon for selling this even after this is a known issue. That is a dangerous health hazard!! If you own this seat CHECK IT!! Your child could be breathing this stuff in!
customer_reviews.author: Dawniee1980

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Discovery
customer_reviews.text: Here are pictures of what I discovered when I opened the box this morning. MOLD! DISGUSTING! Hopefully the replacement will arrive later today in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ersula Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Good Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is lightweight which I like. It's easy to install. However, I had a hell of a time connecting the top of the seat to the bottom. Thank God, I had the help of my fiance because it was getting pretty frustrating. I still don't know how he did it lol. The one thing I don't like is that there is no latch (the hook that goes under the seat in the car). I feel like that would make this the perfect booster. I would highly recommend this however.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mason

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and adjusts for bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Just put it in the vehicle and use the seat belt to buckle the child in. Very light and easy to move from vehicle to vehicle. The only thing I don't like is that it wiggles a bit if the seat belt isn't tight enough. Definitely for older kids as it is easy for them to access the buckle and undo it. The back of the seat comes off so as your child gets older it can be adjusted to fit until they are big enough to it in the seat without a booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: Did so much review reading and looking stuff up for the perfect car seat. Ended up with this one and love it! I only gave it 4 stars because it is very heavy and having back problems it's hard for me to get it in and out of car (but that not the carseats issue). Would definitely buy again though if needed another one. My son has been sitting in it for a while now and has not complained about it once! He's 41lbs and 44 inches. We have gone on long 17 hour road trips and still no complaints from him.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Not stable, not safe
customer_reviews.text: We have few Graco car seats and love them. I purchased Graco booster seat for my 4 years old granddaughter. We like other Graco booster (Affix model) in the other car. Unfortunately, this Highback Turbo is the worst we had for our grandkids. It doesn't have LATCH system, so you can't attach seat to the car. It feels flimsy and I am not sure how it will perform on the sharp turn, I am not sure if it will stay in place or if it will fly with the kid. And as other mentioned, it moves and noisy without the kid in it. I will return this cheap one ($35) and get Graco Affix with Latch System (for $53)
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: No LATCH
customer_reviews.text: This booster doesn’t come with LATCH system that you can use to secures it to the seat. I’d prefer one that does to give me a peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Shek Ho

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Price, less head bobbing car naps
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 4 and sits great in this seat. I have him on a higher priced, bulkier, size adjusting car seat from his earlier years of growth. It isn't bad, but the more he is growing, the more his head falls forward during a car nap and becomes a yoyo bouncing around. It looks so uncomfortable. So I read reviews on Amazon and ordered this car seat. I must say, it is a great product. Lightweight, easy to install, and the quality for its price is amazing. In addition, I noticed my son would rarely have those yoyo Car naps. Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BOT1213

customer_reviews.title: Another Graco product we love.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this car seat & has adjusted well to the change from a 5 point harness. He likes the cup holders, because they slide in & out - he hides his treasures in them! I feel confident in Graco products & this car seat is no different. It was easy to assemble & takes up so much less space than his old bulky car seat. This will be our last car seat!
customer_reviews.author: D Blanchfield

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe - doesn’t stay in 1 place
customer_reviews.text: The seat keeps moving. It makes it difficult to buckle your child. Not safe. 1 trip on internal roads at 25 mph and the seat doesn’t stay, talks a lot. I have used other car seats and booster seats. I have another graco booster seat. I had no issues so far. I think this model should be avoided. Return has become a challenge as once assembled, very difficult to dissemble. Have to spend money to buy box to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jaspreet Kaur Ichpunani

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson graduated into one of these booster-type seats. I really like the head and back protection this seat offers, plus the arm rests are nice for him and the cup holders are a must! He really likes it and says it is comfortable. It can be used with or without the back. I like the extra protection with the back so his head has extra protection. All in all, this is a super seat in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: GAGA

customer_reviews.title: Love this booster for my car.  What's even better is that our granddaughter loves it too.
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter is almost five and was getting tired of the old black carseat she has been using for years. I check the state's mandate for car seats and booster seats, and she can easily move into a booster like this one, which is rated 30 pounds and higher. Some are 40 pounds, and she is not quite that big yet. So this one is perfect for her, and she loves that she can unsnap the belt herself. I like that too. She likes to cup holders. She feels like such a big girl.
customer_reviews.author: cinlmonthornton

customer_reviews.title: No Safety Latches?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good high back booster seat for the price. I trust Graco products and have since my children were small. I was expecting this car seat to have at least some sort of hook latch system to keep the seat safely secured in the car, but it doesnt. It's basically just plopped into the seat and the car's seatbelt is used while the child sits in it. I do wish there were safety latches, but it works fine for our needs. We have it in my husband's Honda Civic coupe and it fits perfectly in the back seat. Cup holders are retractable to allow for more space, fabric and detail is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a tall 4 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have for my 4 year old grandson when he is with me. He is tall for his age, more like a 6 year old than a 4 year old, but this one fits him just right. The only difficulty I have had was after I installed it and he rode in it I realized the head rest needed to go up a bit. I had a little trouble doing that until I figured out you lay the chair out flat to raise the head rest. Otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jjarman

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't secure to your seats - FYI.
customer_reviews.text: It should be much more clear that there is no way to secure this to the actual seat...it just sits on top of the seat freely. This means that if the kiddos are not in it, it can fall forward, slide, tip over, etc. It's not clear at all in description or image that it doesn't latch to the seat. We've purchased almost identical models with the latches to the seat and found those to be much more reliable and easy for the kids to get in and out of when pulling on armrest to get into chair. I'd get one of those and avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Super seat for a super price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfy booster seat for my niece. She finally outgrow the 5pt harness of our other seat, and I was tired of flipping the seat around front to rear depending on which of the girl's was riding with us. She loves her big girl seat with it's TWO cup holders for drinks and Trolls. I love that it's easy to gey her in and out. It appears to be nice and comfy, plenty of *squish* for longer car rides. We got a super price on amazon black Friday in July and I'm so glad I took the chance on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Melle E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for travel, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these seats now, as I have one in my car, my husband's, and provided one for our childcare provider. Very easy to assemble, and fit in all of our vehicles quite comfortably. I like that there are 2 cup holders, as my son likes to snack in the car. I've also traveled with this car seat-I bought a basic travel bag, and it was extremely lightweight to carry on my back through the airport; went through the conveyor just fine also. Overall, this is a great carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Roling

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and I am sorry I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This style of car seat, one that has NO Harness, is the subject of an expose by ProPublica. It will probably be the subject of legal action, if it isn’t already. I purchased this for my granddaughter. We will be destroying this car seat so that it can never be used and replacing it with the harness type. Do your homework, read about the horrendous injuries to the child in a side-impact collision.
customer_reviews.author: Chrondomom

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Typical inexpensive booster. It does not shoot any lasers or missiles unless you use your imagination. Does require basic mechanical knowledge to click all the pieces together. This uses the vehicle's seatbelt and does not click into the child restraining systems. This seat is a high back booster. Very easy to remove from the vehicle since it's not attached. You should be familiar with your state laws regarding child restraining.
customer_reviews.author: JoshDog

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't attach to vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This seat has no latch system, I’m returning. I think it completely defeats the purpose of a safety seat if it doesn’t attach to the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: MtnMomma1202

customer_reviews.title: Graco booster seat for the win!
customer_reviews.text: The kids needed a 2nd set of seats for the other car we have and are now a little older so these are these closest to the 2 Graco 5 point harness booster seats they have in the other car-Almost identical as those -shape small footprint etc. They are both big enough for not needing a 5 point harness now so these are just what we needed, Same quality product. great price and trust this brand. Purchase 2 identical of these seats.
customer_reviews.author: bargainshopper0117

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat.
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. Inexpensive, strong, well padded, cup holders are actually in an easy reach area & don't get in the way. Easy to put together. The only bad thing for me is the shoulder seat belt holder on the carseat, it might just be my car or my child, he's rather slim & tall for a 5yr old, but it sits at an awkward height, & the belt won't stay in it. Otherwise it fits him perfectly & he says it's very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: No latch straps
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 Graco Affix boosters that look almost identical to this and my son wanted one as well. He saw the mosaic pattern and chose that. I didn't realize that it doesn't have the latch system that clips to the seat like the Affix seat. Thats the only reason I gave it 4 stars. I can fix 3 of these to a row in my 2014 Honda Pilot. They kids think they are comfortable and the height adjustment is perfect for 3 different size kids!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't position lap belt to lap; otherwise mostly ok.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this seat, but I can't get it to hold the seat-belt on her lap and not across her stomach, and the side padding does nothing to keep a child from slumping forward or to the side if they fall asleep, which is a little disconcerting. The shoulder positioner seems fine, but that lap portion concerns me. A booster seat should be making sure the seat-belt is positioned correctly across the shoulder/chest *and* the lap. This on only managed half the equation.
customer_reviews.author: Karasu

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, but a few nit picks too
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, feels sturdy, kids are comfortable. No questions on safety, easy to get in/out of the car. I don't like how the armrest pads come off all the time and also the red seat belt holder is not perfect. I feel like I can't leave the restraint in there all the time. Also, I would like the cup holders to be a bit higher so that water bottles can sit in there without a quick knock to the side to get them out of the holder.
customer_reviews.author: JMKE

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't to sure about this seat when I first saw it. But after browsing around on amazon for a while I came back to it and was sure this was the car seat I wanted to buy. It was very well packaged and shipped out right away. Over all the seat feels sturdy easy to assemble ( no tools needed). My daughter absolutely loves it. Great equality for a great price. The Seat cover is washable for if it was to get dirty for any reason. Over all I'd recommend this chair to friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Crywolf377

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat for 4/5 Year old.
customer_reviews.text: THis is a great car seat. My 4 year old loves it. I like it even better than the other leading brand of these because the headrest sticks out a bit farther. He can sleep and his head doesn't fall to the side so easily. Great car seat and inexpensive too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews we decided on the Graco Highback as well. So far so good. Feels pretty secure. Cup holder is a nice bonus. Our son is 4 plus years old and weighs about 43 pounds. We purchased this one for dad's truck but for his main transportation he's still in a 5 point harness seat. We actually will be purchasing another Graco Highback for my parents. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Hakkattack

customer_reviews.title: Comfy safe cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good car seat. I'd buy again. Cheap, easy, safe. Pros: Easy set up. Comfortable and holds head when child falls asleep. Cheap. So light to move from car to car. Child stays in safe seating position. Mine is 44" and 46# at four. Cons: cup holders are too shallow meaning doesn't hold my child's cups. We use taller water bottles though because we live in FL it's hot so need more than a sippy for a day out. Sometimes I wish the top belt holder was a clip or something that didn't often need to be rethreaded but it's a minor annoyance and for price ok.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy, safe and secure!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the price and functionality but this thing is great. Just plop and go. My son had an easy time using it and expressed his gleeful satisfaction the first trip sitting in this booster. We also loved the retractable cup holders. Previous seats had protruding holders that tended to get in the way of the back seats or would end up breaking do to the slightest pressure applied but not these... Because they disappear into the seat!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in Jeep patriot!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, hidden cup holders a bonus although they are shallow so be cautious of open drinks. I like that it has a recline option. I have a jeep patriot and the seat fits better at the slight recline to it is closer to my Jeep seat, Daughter has fallen asleep comfortably thanks to the nice headrests.
customer_reviews.author: Abbe

customer_reviews.title: Love these boosters!
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these that was on it's third kid, in use since 2005. I realized one day how old and beat up it was and with kid number 4 on the way I decided to get a new one. Of course I went with the same brand and style since I liked the first one so much. The style is narrow enough that when I had two in boosters (the oldest had a backless version when kid #2 graduated to booster) and one in a car seat they all fit great in the back seat of my park avenue. Also the kids love the cup holders that slide in, so they can hide their toys in there.
customer_reviews.author: LibertyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fine purchase
customer_reviews.text: I need to have a car seat for my daughter so she can unbuckle herself while I drop her off in front of the school. This will do the work, but I am still a little nerves that the car seat won't stay steady on the back seat, there is not isofix to really hold the car seat. But I find many of them are like this, so I guess it is ok? Anyway, if I am going on a long road trip, I would still put the kid into the normal 5-point car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great 'extra' car seat for sitter, grandma, whatever...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this seat to use with our babysitter who picks up my 4.5 yr old 2-3 days a week and cannot leave a seat in her car all the rest of the week. Its light weight, very easy to pop in and out, compact enough to use in her Mini Cooper. Very good extra seat. Good to have in case you need to drive someone else's kid too.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, a little too wide
customer_reviews.text: These are a little too wide for my 2018 Ford Escape. Too much of a hassle to return, but if I could purchase again I would look for something a little bit more narrow. However the kids love them and they say the seats are very comfortable. And I like that I could order them the color they wanted. Assembling the seat when it arrived was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I own several.
customer_reviews.text: Got another one. It installs and moves between cars easily, and has good head support/protection. I like that it relies on the seatbelt, and is adjustable (to a point) in elevating the neck strap to accommodate growth. I personally wait to transition to this till the kids are almost out of being required to be in car seats, and they enjoy the cup holders, elevated seating to see out the window, independence of buckling themselves in (with assistance usually), and headrest for leaning during naps. Changing cars? Undo belt buckle and move. Too tall? Remove the back and just use the booster bottom itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat was super easy to assemble and I like that it has an attached back that can be removed as your child grows. The softer pillows on the headrest and back slip out too incase you have a finicky child that does not want them there. The cover comes off easily for cleaning which is wonderful and it installs in the car like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: So easy a child can put it together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble... And I mean VERY easy. My 7 year old daughter put it together in 20 minutes by herself. Should take an adult no more than 5 minutes, and that is including opening the box and throwing the instructions away before fumbling for three minutes. We had a Britax that supported up to 70lbs. And she outgrew it. We wanted to keep her in a carseat with head support in case she fell asleep on those long trips. And this does the trick. She absolutely loves it. And the color options are great.
customer_reviews.author: Will Phan

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful spare car seat
customer_reviews.text: We needed an extra car seat to pop into my car on the days I pick up my daughter and whichever friend is coming over for a play-date. I love Graco, because I trust the brand. This seat is wonderful with its high back, and the ease of installation is insane. It does not have anchors (which would bother me if this was my daughter's primary car seat and we were heading out on a road trip, but this is just used for local, non-highway trips). It easily connects with the seat-belt, and it works great just to take an extra kid home from school. It serves its purpose well, and it wasn't expensive. Score!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mama

customer_reviews.title: the best $38 i've spent this year.
customer_reviews.text: this thing doesnt look like a $38 product. it's just great, don't know what else to describe. Read so many reviews, some good , some bad, i got tired so i just pulled the trigger and i'm glad i got this. I tested the materials and i'm sure that this will protect my baby girl really well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip teo

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I have twins and looking for small booster seats for them. I’m glad I found this one. Thank you it’s perfect and fit for my Altima no problem, and the color is beautiful. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This seat is great. My 5 year old granddaughter has been bugging her parents for a different car seat and she was very happy with this one. It took her a bit to figure out how to get buckled in, but she got the hang of it. I felt she was safe in it. The seat stayed where it was put, no sliding or leaning even with all of her dancing and wiggling around. She never complained about the seat bring hard even though we took a ride for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, no installation, my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband's car for our 4-year-old who is just transitioning to a booster. He likes it a lot and says it's comfortable. We like how lightweight it is and how it just sits in the car and you buckle the child with the regular seatbelt. Our son likes that he can use the "big boy" seat belt. The back is flexible so it just lays against your car's seat at whatever angle it is -- no adjusting needed. This is great, especially if you need a seat that can easily be moved in and out of different vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good seat for a sedan. The arm rests make it impossible to reach the seat buckle. So I took them off. Now it's possible. But it looks ugly. The arm rests holes are still elevated so it's not a completely flat seat. It adjusts the head portion and easy to put seatbelt through so I just went ahead and kept it. But I would only buy this for captain chairs not to use on a smaller row.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Light and protective
customer_reviews.text: I got these as my kids are older (so they use boosters) yet they fall asleep in the car a bit. These are lightweight yet provide good protection. For longer trips, these are our default car seats. I own at least 6 of these between all of our cars. For reference, when younger my kids used the Britax Boulevard and Recaro Performance Sport car seats - both extremely well made, but a lot heavier and pricer. These Graco ones do the job for the older kids without compromising on their safety.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: Good but hides the seat belt buckle
customer_reviews.text: If this car seat were 1” narrower it’d be great. Everything else about the seat is wonderful, but after my child gets in the car seat it gets pushed over in front of the buckle. Then I have to pull the whole seat back over with the child in it so that I can actually get the seat belt into the buckle. It’s like this in multiple vehicles that I’ve put the car seat in. It’s just annoying and will make it harder for my kid to learn to do it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 year old and will last until he's out of a booster!
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to move around the vehicle, just uses the vehicle's own seat belt device to harness the child. My four year old has learned to buckle himself in and I will double check to make sure it's correct. It was a little bit difficult to assemble initially, but will last until he's out of a booster and in a normal seat in the car. For $30, it was a great deal. I plan on purchasing another for my daughter when she outgrows her current carseat.
customer_reviews.author: AMsunshine621

customer_reviews.title: It is adequate for a 6 year old with a long body.
customer_reviews.text: I really cannot recommend or not recommend this product. For me, it is all about safety and I prefer the way the headrest is made. I would have liked to see more statistics on safety. Compared to the models I researched this was one of the better seats.
customer_reviews.author: Tonie

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade for my son who is growing faster than we can keep up with with regards to carseats/boosters. This one is nice. Installation is simple (even I can figure it out) and my son love the fact that he has two cup holders on each side of the base of the carseat that slide in and out. it's not too heavy to move around, but it doesn't feel cheap either. I trust this product to keep my son safe. And it's a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stoneweaver28

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good seat.
customer_reviews.text: I like the high back boosters, just safer, but there are a few things I don’t like about this. For whatever reason the arm rest cushions keep coming off and I am finding them randomly around the car. Also, it can sometimes be hard for my 6 year old to strap himself in because the seat belt gets hung up around the red loop by the shoulder so I have to stop after school pickup and help I would say about 50% of the time. Other than that I’m pleased with the seat. It’s lightweight which I like.
customer_reviews.author: MillertimeUSNA

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with our new Grace highback booster car seat! Great price, great quality, easy for my almost 5 yr old to buckle on his own, even sleeps well in it and keeps him in the right position.
customer_reviews.author: BLarson

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for a better/safer booster car seat.
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions. I had to study the photo to figure out how to assembly. There are no belts to anchor to the car. It just sets in the seat. You place the child in the seat and buckle the child in place. The booster car seat is a bit wide so it’s not easy to buckle. The buckle in the vehicle is slightly behind the seat. You almost have to climb over your child to get the seat belt buckled.
customer_reviews.author: Virgo Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a highback booster seat but my car is not "friendly" to a lot of the car seats and boosters. However, this one fits perfectly! I use it for grandchildren so they're not in it for long periods of time but they seem to like it. And I love the green color!
customer_reviews.author: K. English

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My daughter already has one similar to this, but needed a second one to accommodate all of our vehicles (we’re transitioning into boosters now). I love the color and how simple it is! I didn’t realize the cup holders can be hidden when not used, which is a huge plus for me! Highly recommended this! Not bulky and quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: The child specifications are WRONG
customer_reviews.text: This seat looks great, was pretty easy to put together and is comfortable. However, I fought this for my 3 year old 40 inch tall and 48 lb child. As that is what the seller indicates is appropriate. However, the book that arrives says 40-100 lbs, 43-57 inch tall. I bought this seat bc of the shorter height requirements, but turns out the info is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy to use, mostly. I drive a mini van, so that alone tells you I'm trustworthy and knowledgeable with my day-to-day purchases. I have twins who are almost 5 using these, and my almost 7 year-old uses one, too. I get annoyed only where the belt threads through above the shoulder. It's difficult for a few seconds each day. Added up over time I could use those extra minutes spending more time writing reviews on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Beckstar

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat. Very lightweight yet sturdy. Cupholders are very nice to have. People complaining that it isn't as secure as a baby carseat apparently aren't familiar with how a booster seat works, you just use the seatbelts in your car, nothing else needed. I love it, easy to use, works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best car seat. We have had it 2015-2019. My son still uses the booster without the back on it as he no longer falls asleep each car ride lol. This is comfortable, safe, and can withstand my sons mistreatment of climbing all over it and changing cars. I would definitely recommend it as it truly has been an investment into my sons safety and comfort for the past 4 years and counting. He's 8 now.
customer_reviews.author: Jordash386

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat. It’s the 3rd one we’ve gotten for our 6 year old for all the cars he frequents for family members. It’s one of the few seats that is narrow enough so that it doesn’t cover up the seat belt buckle piece so he can actual buckle himself. Easy to clean as well. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebden3

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not secure
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of these seats at all. They feel cheaply made, the arm padding’s don’t stay on the seat belt holder doesn’t hold the seatbelt and the kids are not secure. If I turn or are coming off a ramp the seat tilts to the side. I’m going to buy new ones and return these
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: the stoppers are out and can fall over quite easily and spill liquids in the back seat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Only one problem is that the cup holders don't really hold medium width sippy cups well. As I have a 4 year old, the stoppers are out and can fall over quite easily and spill liquids in the back seat. You can help secure it by pushing the holder in once the cup is in it, but I just wish there was a little more tension. Still, love the seat, would highly recommend it, closer to 9 stars out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: T. Den 26

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat. Just transitioned my daughter from a five point harness seat to this high back booster and she loves the cup holders! Super easy to put together, easier to take the covers off if it needs to be washed. Simple transfer from vehicle to vehicle if necessary. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Gets dirty fast.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this seat a little over a year and I’ve washed it a few times. My child does eat in the car but its still stained up even after washing it. I wish I would’ve went with a darker color. I guess from him sweating after playing at school all day stains the back of the seat. Now it looks very grungy. It still does the job and keeps him safe in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: We have five of these
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. We have five of them across our kids & cars - they are so easy to install and easy for the kids to work around. Two cup holders is super. The only tricky part is figuring out how to assemble the first time - trick is to basically fold it flat / backwards to engage the hinge, then you're golden. I suppose this keeps it from accidentally coming unhinged.
customer_reviews.author: Brooxi

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: 5 yo was rear facing till a month before his birthday. He loves this seat. Especially the cup holders that open and close into the seat. I was worried about the seat moving if he was not with me but it has not moved at all. Very happy with this seat and after borrowing another brand I would buy this one over the other, more expensive seat.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this today and assembled it very easily. However, the top half that hooks on to the booster part is very flimsy and does not lock in place. I sat my son in it and he easily moved it forward and backward with no effort. I don't feel it is safe at all. DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an excellent seat
customer_reviews.text: I moved my 4 (almost 5) year old into this seat, from her Graco 4ever because my one year old needed the 4ever. It's super light and easy to move, the back is flimsy, doesn't seem to connect super well, but it stays connected and I'm fairly certain I put it together correctly. The pattern is super cute, daughter loves it even though it isn't pink :)
customer_reviews.author: 11brookey

customer_reviews.title: This does not come with any hooks to be able to use the child safely latch system in most cars.
customer_reviews.text: The leg room is great for my toddler and it's very comfortable for him, but I was a bit disappointed to find out that this booster seat only rests on your existing auto car seat, meaning there is no attachment point on the booster seat itself to be able to hook it to the child safety latch system located under the seat of our car, so if there is an auto accident or collision, you have to rely 100% on the automobile seat belt to hold both the toddler and booster seat in place. The previous booster seat made by Graco that we purchased had this feature. I'm not sure why they didn't design this one the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Form the money this is a god value. The back is a bit flimsy but still does well in the car just moving it from one place to another is awkward. It wouldn’t be one I would want to take on a plane , only because of the reason I listed above. My granddaughter loves it and the cup holders make it great. I would definitely purchase it again if I needed a second one.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRIE

customer_reviews.title: Great booster starts at 30lbs prefect for my little guy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old for his birthday he is very small and finally outgrew his 5 point harness car seat. This was one of the few started at 30 pounds not 40lbs like most so that was a winning point for me. He likes the fun pattern and his cup holders and seems comfy. He doesn’t flop forward when he falls asleep. Chair is super easy to assemble and get in and out of the car. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheesy made product I bought this for my grandson back in August He lives out west I had the chance to see this for myself a week ago Do not buy this product it is not safe at all My grandson fell asleep in it and when the car turned the corner he bumped his head on the window Would send it back but the box is gone Worst ever and flimsy
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Child Boaster Carseat
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and has plenty of storage compartments/cup holder for the child to easily reach. It was easy to put together with instructions. My only complaint was that it didn't come with an additional belt to secure the seat to the vehicle. The carseat is not secured in the vehicle unless the child is physically sitting in the chair or you buckle an empty carseat. Additionally, ensure that your child is old enough to know not to unbuckle the carseat on his/her own when the car door is open.
customer_reviews.author: Porsh

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous car seat and easy to use, install, and move. I have a single child, so I bought this to keep in my trunk for picking up friends for play dates! Works great! My daughter wants to use this full time but she's not really ready for that yet... Hooghly recommend. Heat l great price, great seat!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to clean (and to reassemble when vomit necessitates being ...
customer_reviews.text: If these seats can withstand the crazy antics of my two boys, they can withstand anything. They are easy to clean (and to reassemble when vomit necessitates being washed in the washing machine). I also appreciate the adjustable head rests, as both of my boys have grown tall very quickly and the seats have grown with them.
customer_reviews.author: centrefrenchie

customer_reviews.title: Seat is not too bad but I head bad shopping experience where I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: Seat is not too bad but I head bad shopping experience where I wanted just to select different color but it actually change other characteristics and I got a seat without latch system which I wanted and confirm that original color actually head.
customer_reviews.author: Sinisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this product absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the seaT for my son the two cupholders are the best it is so easy to put together and so easy to use and it turns into a regular just the bottom booster also which is even better you don’t have to spend more money. I would recommend this to anybody who needs a booster seat
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very good carseat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this long ago but I decide to provide a review on this since I really liked it a lot. I own about 7 of these booster car seat. This is the best of them all. The price is very reasonable. If the seat can be tilted backward, this can also be tiled backward. I have a few others which can't. Adjusting the height is also easy. The back can be taken out so the booster can be used if your kids get a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Edison Jiang

customer_reviews.title: The padding’s were moldy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this booster seat for my 6 year old daughter. Firstly I must say the seat is very nice but it looks small for my daughter, secondly there’s mole on the padding’s what’s up with that? I’d like a replacement or a refund cause in this pandemic I dnt need my baby getting sick off no online item!
customer_reviews.author: Double dd

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal for a seat but I’m sure there are better ones out there. My son has trouble buckling in because the arm rests don’t go up and down. Also, the arm rest covers come off easily. Probably for washing, but a little elastic could go a long way. There is no cup holder, but it isn’t an issue because my SUV middle seat hasn’t a pull down armrest/cup holder console. For the money, I’d buy again. When my daughter is ready I may get the same one in a girly color.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my almost 6 yr old son. He's on the small side so I wasn't sure how things would work for him. I love that this will grow and adjust with him and he loved the cop holders and tried to set it up to lounge in the living room when we first got it.
customer_reviews.author: Yasemin Witzke

customer_reviews.title: Easy!!! No fuss with multiple kids!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the moms and I carpool for our kindergarteners so I bought this to have an extra seat. It’s super light weight to switch vehicles if anyone needs an extra seat and super easy to adjust size wise for each kid. Seriously only takes 2 minutes and I usually do it on the go while they’re buckling themselves, which after a few practice rounds, the kids all were able to reach over it and buckle themselves. Def reccomend if you need a booster you will need to move between cars or kids easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Some minor assembly required, but once assembled, it was a breeze to put in the car. It works using the existing seat belt system in the vehicle. The price was great and out grandson really loves the seat. once we threaded the existing belt into the seat, he felt like a big boy because he could get in and belt himself in without help. We double checked - precious cargo!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take in and out, harness is difficult for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take on a flight and use in rental cars on vacation. My daughter loves it. It has a holster to run seatbelt though to help work better for kids. The only issue is that it's hard for the kids to pull the seatbelt though when it's in the harness. My daughter usually ends up taking it out of the harness.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest and lightweight car seat I have used! All you do is pop it into the seat and buckle you little in. It is easy to travel with we just buckled it into our large duffel bag. I have also removed and washed all parts and it was easy to put back together but you have to pay attention bc there are a lot of straps and small hooks.
customer_reviews.author: K.P. Ducky

product_meta.title: Graco TurboBooster Highback Booster Seat, Go Green
product_meta.description: Give your big kid a boost. Loaded with comfort features for kids, the Graco TurboBooster Highback Booster Seat helps protect your growing child, from 40-100 lb.* This 2-in-1 seat converts from a highback to a backless booster as your big kid grows. Kids love cool perks like the hideaway cup holders and comfort features, especially the height-adjustable head support and padded, height-adjustable armrests. Parents love that it helps protect their child by raising them up to the proper height for the seat belt. Open-loop belt guides help properly position the vehicle seat belt to allow for independent self-buckling. This seat is Graco ProtectPlus Engineered to help protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes. *To continue to meet industry standards, we have increased the weight minimum from 30 to 40 lb.
feature_bullets: Helps safely transport your big kid from 4-10 years old, from 40-100 lb* and up to 57 inches tall *To continue to meet industry standards, we have increased the weight minimum from 30 to 40 lb
2-in-1 seat easily converts from a highback booster to backless booster for years of use
Full coverage back support even as your child grows
EPS, energy-absorbing foam for effective impact management
Multi-layer headrest for your child's comfort
Padded, height-adjustable armrests and hide-away cup holders will help keep your child content on the road
Open-loop belt guides help correctly position your vehicle seat belt
Fully adjustable headrest keeps your growing child secure on all of your journeys together
This seat is engineered and crash tested to meet or exceed US standard FMVSS 213

Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps to protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes; additional testing based on the New Car Assessment Program and for extreme car interior temperatures

specifications.Care instructions: Machine-washable seat cushion, Metal and plastic parts may be cleaned with mild soap and cool water
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,600 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
